actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the request of the U.S. Government that the Government of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics provide Valentyn Moroz with the opportunity to accept the invitation of Harvard University.

summary.text: Directs the President to request the Soviet Union to permit Valentyn Moroz to accept an invitation of Harvard University.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the request of the U.S. Government that the Government of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics provide Valentyn Moroz with the opportunity to accept the invitation of Harvard University.
